title: Harry Potter Series
description: Harry Potter is a series of fantasy movies originally written as books by British author J. K. Rowling. The movies chronicle the life of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. These are in order based on their original theatrical release date.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
questEntries.description: Harry Potter's first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as he discovers that he is a famous wizard and begins his education.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
questEntries.description: Harry Potter's second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as the Heir of Salazar Slytherin opens the Chamber of Secrets, unleashing a monster that petrifies the school's denizens.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
questEntries.description: Harry Potter's third year at Hogwarts as he is informed that a prisoner named Sirius Black has escaped from Azkaban intending to kill him.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
questEntries.description: Harry Potter's fourth year at Hogwarts as he is chosen by the Goblet of Fire to compete in the Triwizard Tournament.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
questEntries.description: Harry Potter's fifth year at Hogwarts as the Ministry of Magic is in denial of Lord Voldemort's return.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
questEntries.description: Harry Potter's sixth year at Hogwarts as he receives a mysterious textbook, falls in love, and attempts to retrieve a memory that holds the key to Lord Voldemort's downfall.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1
questEntries.description: The story follows Harry Potter who has been tasked by Dumbledore with finding and destroying Lord Voldemort's secret to immortality – the Horcruxes.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2
questEntries.description: The story continues to follow Harry Potter's quest to find and destroy Lord Voldemort's Horcruxes in order to stop him once and for all.
